abilities.name: Devil's Sight.
abilities.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The abishai's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
* At will: alter self, major image
* 3/day each: charm person, detect thoughts, fear
* 1/day each: confusion, dominate person, mass suggestion

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Magic Weapons.
abilities.description: The abishai's weapon attacks are magical. Actions

abilities.name: Multiattack.
abilities.description: The abishai makes two attacks, one with its claws and one with its longsword, or it casts one spell from its Innate Spellcasting trait and makes one claw attack.

abilities.name: Longsword.
abilities.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands.
